snippet.title: ADLEYS 9th MERMAiD BiRTHDAY - Roblox STORY GAME!! Niko & Navey find codes! Merdad looks for secrets!
snippet.description:
Giant krakens aren’t real…. RiGHT?!?

JOIN THE FAM - https://www.youtube.com/@GforGaming

We made our OWN MERMAiD game?!-
https://www.roblox.com/share?code=f786932716176d4389ed2f07163a205b&type=ExperienceDetails&stamp=1749629134792

HEY EVERYBODY!! 

You don't need to read that again, you heard right! We've been hard at work behind the scenes working on a very very special and CUTE Roblox surprise for you all! So... Welcome back boys and girls to another amazing episode of your favorite gamers on YouTube! It's another brand new G for Gaming!! Today we have the ENTIRE family together, Mom, Dad, Adley, Niko & Navey, are all here to try out our brand new Roblox Story game that we've been working on! It's called "Mermaid Adley - Birthday Party Story" and it's based on our Spacestation Animation episode of Adley's 9th Birthday party! So if you've ever wanted to play the game version of that whole story, now you can!

We all logged onto Roblox and transported to the same game so that we could go through this epic adventure together! When we first spawned in Adley & Navey found out that we have Bubble Powers! We can launch bubbles out of our hands and use them to hit pinatas or even break through secret walls! Niko even found a jellyfish obby later and was such a pro that he beat it on his first try and found a secret code that unlocks Merdad's tail that you can use in the game to customize your own mermaid character! Once you get far enough, you even get a cute little hermit crab friend! Jenny and Shaun even got the same color hermit crab pet, they were both pink! We're going to keep updating all of our games and adding new fun stuff into it all so make sure to keep your eyes open and ears listening for when new stuff is dropping for our Roblox games! Thanks Spacestation Apps for building these awesome experiences for us and YOU all to be able to have so much fun with!

Thanks for Watching!! BYE! PSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHHHHHHH


enjoy some A for Adley videos: https://www.youtube.com/c/AforAdleyLe...
have a blast with our A for Adley Shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMHpfyAqrjrhn-mRS2bUL0g
share a best day ever with our family: https://www.youtube.com/user/Shonduras
fun best day ever shorts: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgVE...

watch the latest A for Adley video: MERMAiD FRiENDS - Lost in the DEEP SEA!!
Adley learns Magic from Merdad and his fun
Human Treasures
https://youtu.be/wrpPOuQCCxY?feature=shared


this is our channel G for Gaming!! this is a place that i can share all of my favorite gaming moments!!
